text: Twilight's Last Gleaming and similar phrases could refer to: *"...Twilight's Last Gleaming... ", a phrase from the national anthem of the United States, "The Star-Spangled Banner" *Twilight's Last Gleaming, a 1977 German-American film directed by Robert Aldrich *Twilight's Last Gleaming, a 2014 novel by John Michael Greer *Twilights Last Gleaming, a 1997 album by the British hip hop group Gunshot ==See also== *"Last Gleaming", a storyline in the Buffy the Vampire Slayer Season Eight comic book series *Twilight's Last Gleaming Cross Country Challenge, an annual running race held in Ventura, California
title: Twilight's Last Gleaming (disambiguation)
